Today I wonder if those who routinely use the expression “Undeclared Emergency” must introspect & ask where was I for those 19 months?
Emergency was an era of sycophancy suffering from a dichotomy.  A dictatorial regime is often misled by its own propaganda.
Mrs. Indira Gandhi got amended the Constitution & the Representation of the People Act retrospectively to statutorily reverse court's order.
The first act after the imposition of the Emergency was the detention of the political opposition under the Preventive Detention Law
Emergency was imposed by Mrs. Indira Gandhi on the midnight of 25-26 June
